definition: to welcome a guest/to entertain a customer (of prostitute)
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)

sentences.english: Yunfu Conifer Guest Hotel welcome you to visit.
sentences.chinese: 雲浮康年迎賓館歡迎你的光臨。

sentences.english: We are staying in the Hetian Yingbinguan Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我們住在了和田迎賓館酒店。

sentences.english: Here's our welcome brochure with all the information of our facilities.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們的迎賓手冊，裏面介紹了酒店的各項設施。

sentences.english: Dance with ushers and any single male guests who ask them.
sentences.chinese: 和迎賓員和單身男來賓一起跳舞。

sentences.english: We have only one welcome drink coupon for each guest.
sentences.chinese: 我們的每一位客人都只給一張迎賓飲料券。

sentences.english: Work in pairs, perform a dialog about welcoming guests.
sentences.chinese: 兩兩合作，表演一段餐館迎賓的英語對話。

sentences.english: I am a greeter at this five star hotel, it is a dead-end job.
sentences.chinese: 我是這個五星級酒店的迎賓員，毫無晉升的機會。

sentences.english: We stopped at the Welcome Center for free orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我們在迎賓中心逗留，喝免費的柳橙汁。

sentences.english: Look, even these Yingbin Ponds welcome us.
sentences.chinese: 你看，連迎賓池都在歡迎我們。

sentences.english: Hotel guest or waiter is preferred, but not mandatory outstanding person conditions.
sentences.chinese: 酒店迎賓或服務員者優先考慮，優秀者條件可放寬。

sentences.english: The following reports reflect the results of our recent People Greeter study.
sentences.chinese: 以下報告是最近進行的迎賓員調查的結果。

sentences.english: The rotary drilling rig excavation in Yingbin Road Station means the start of the station enclosure construction.
sentences.chinese: 迎賓路站旋挖鑽機開挖，意味着該站圍護施工的開始。

sentences.english: At every club one of the servants was a doorman . Mr.
sentences.chinese: 在每傢俱樂部的門口都有一名迎賓員。

sentences.english: There are 14 saluting guns specially made for the Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運會有專門製造的14門迎賓禮炮。

sentences.english: Here is the ruin of Luohan Hall.

definition: Xiangzhou district of Zhuhai city 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)

Da'an or Ta'an district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Da'an district of Zigong city 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 shi4], Sichuan/Ta'an township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
Changzhi township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
